mapper.insert: INSERT INTO email_verifications ( email, verification_key, expires_at, created_at ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{verificationKey}, #{expiresAt}, #{createdAt} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE verification_key = VALUES(verification_key), expires_at = VALUES(expires_at), created_at = VALUES(created_at)
mapper.select: SELECT email, verification_key, expires_at, created_at FROM email_verifications WHERE email = #{email}
